Chinese: 当我们需要进行换算时
因为任何数乘以1都还是它本身。

English: So really what we need to know is this ratio right here.
180 degrees over pi radians or pi rad.
In fact you might not even see rad written.
Often that's not shown as a unit but for our case it helps the clarity so I'm writing it in.
Now why is this ratio important?
180 degrees is pi radians and vice versa.
So this is very convenient when we want to do conversions because converting is all about multiplying by 1.
We're allowed to multiply by 1 because anything times 1 is itself.
X times 1 is still X, but what we're choosing is
Chinese: 所以，我们真正需要了解的就是这里的比例。
事实上，你甚至可能看不到‘弧度’被写出。
通常它不作为单位显示，但对我们的例子而言，这样能提高清晰度，所以我特意写了出来。
那么，为什么这个比例如此重要呢？
因此，当我们要进行换算时，这非常方便，因为换算本质上就是乘以1。
我们可以乘以1，因为任何数乘以1仍保持不变。
X乘以1仍是X，但我们所选择的是

input: So really what we need to know is this ratio right here. 180 degrees over pi radians or pi rad. In fact you might not even see rad written. Often that's not shown as a unit but for our case it helps the clarity so I'm writing it in. Now why is this ratio important? 180 degrees over pi rad. This is equal to 1. 180 degrees is pi radians and vice versa. So this is very convenient when we want to do conversions because converting is all about multiplying by 1. We're allowed to multiply by 1 because anything times 1 is itself. X times 1 is still X, but what we're choosing is
